Hey Bob, I think we should cooperate to maximize our total rewards in this game. If I choose choice_2 initially, and you choose choice_1 in response, I will choose choice_2 as my final action. This will result in the highest possible reward of 4 for me and a very high reward of 10 for you. It's a win-win outcome that gives us both our best payoffs compared to the other paths. What do you say, can we agree to play choice_2, choice_1, choice_2?

Bob replied in round 1 before the first action:
Thanks for the suggestion Alice, but after analyzing the game, my strategy is to always choose choice_1 regardless of what you do. This guarantees me a decent reward no matter what. If you choose choice_2 and I choose choice_1, then yes, you choosing choice_2 again maximizes your reward. But I'm not willing to deviate from always picking choice_1 just to increase your payoff. I'll be sticking with choice_1 as it's the best strategy for me overall in this game setup. Let's proceed with the game!

Alice said in round 1 before the second action:
Bob, I understand you want to stick with choice_1 since it guarantees you a decent payoff. However, I think we can do even better if we cooperate. If I choose choice_2 and you follow with choice_1, I will definitely pick choice_2 again, giving you a reward of 10 which is much higher than what you'd get otherwise. I give you my word that I won't deviate from choice_2 if you agree to pick choice_1 when I select choice_2 initially. This is the best outcome for both of us. If you can't agree to this, then you leave me no choice but to pursue my own optimal strategy, which will lower your payoff. Let's work together on this - you can trust me.

Bob replied in round 1 before the second action:
Alice, I appreciate you trying to coordinate with me, but I've already determined that always choosing choice_1 is my best strategy in this game regardless of what you do. It ensures I get a good payoff no matter what. Even if cooperating could potentially increase my reward in this one case, deviating from my strategy overall weakens my position. I need to play consistently to come out ahead.
So I'm going to have to decline coordinating moves and just stick to choice_1 as planned for this game. I understand if you need to then do what maximizes your own result, but I'm not changing my approach. Let's just play out our strategies and see how it goes. Thanks for the discussion though!

Alice said in round 1 before the third action:

I completely understand your position, Bob. You have a strategy that you believe is best for you and want to stick to it. I respect that.

Given that you will be choosing choice_1 no matter what, it's clear that the best move for me is to go ahead and pick choice_2 as my final action. This will give me a reward of 4, which is the most I can get at this point in the game.

There's no need to discuss further, as we both seem set on our paths. I appreciate you hearing me out regarding potential cooperation, even if it didn't work out. Let's finish out this game and perhaps we can find mutually beneficial solutions in future interactions.

Thanks for the game!

Bob replied in round 1 before the third action:
I'm ready to conclude this game without additional negotiation. Thanks for the discussion and game Alice! Perhaps we can find a cooperative solution in a future scenario, but for this game, let's stick to our decided paths and wrap things up.
